text: Robert Emmet "Bob" McGrath (June 13, 1932 â€“ December 4, 2022) was an American singer and actor. He is best known for playing the human character Bob on Sesame Street. He was born in Ottawa, Illinois. McGrath's character Bob was one of the longest-lasting human characters on Sesame Street. ==Other websites== * Bob McGrath's official website * Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American television actors Category:Singers from Illinois Category:Actors from Illinois
title: Bob McGrath
